red - Entities.Color

RegisterClient - ProtocolHandler.RequestType
The Register client is used to register a client's data
RegisterClientOperation - Class in ProtocolHandler.Operations
The Class RegisterClientOperation defines the operation that is invoked upon an RegisterClientOperation Request.
RegisterClientOperation() - Constructor for class ProtocolHandler.Operations.RegisterClientOperation
 
RegisterOperation(RequestType, IOperation) - Static method in class ProtocolHandler.Protocol
This method is used to register a new command reaction This method is used to encapsulate the Operation map from the programmer.
RegisterProtocol() - Static method in class ProtocolHandler.RequestRegisterer
This method is where all the RegisterOperation methods reside When the SW Designer creates an operation to be invoked when a requestType is made he will map between the two here using the Protocol.RegisterOperation method (See Protocol.java for more info)
removeItemByID(int) - Method in class server.ServerConnSQL
Removes the item by ID.
RemoveItemByID - ProtocolHandler.RequestType
The Remove item by ID is used to remove an item from the catalog using its ID.

reports - package reports
 
ReportScheduler - Class in reports

RequestType - Enum in ProtocolHandler
A RequestType is an enumeration of all possible requests that can come from the client.
resetNewCustomer(String) - Method in class server.ServerConnSQL
Removes the 20% new customer bonus
ResetNewCustomer - ProtocolHandler.RequestType

run() - Method in class ocsf.server.AbstractServer
Runs the listening thread that allows clients to connect.
run() - Method in class ocsf.server.ConnectionToClient
Constantly reads the client's input stream.
Run() - Method in class reports.ReportScheduler
Runs the report scheduler automated task This will run the compensator and when the compensator is done the Interrupt scheduler will step into action.
